headline: 3 Reasons to Sell MDLZ and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Mondelez trades at $66.06 per share and has stayed right on track with the overall market, losing 6.5% over the last six months while the S&P 500 is down 9.8%. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
